site.title: DOPAMINE PHARMA
hero.p: DOPAMINE PHARMA (DPM) delivers high‑quality pharmaceuticals and cosmeceuticals to doctors & pharmacies across Jordan. We build trust through evidence, training, and reliable supply.
why.title: Why DPM
why.ul:
• Regulatory‑compliant formulations & clear documentation
  • Field excellence with trained medical & sales reps
  • Consistent availability and responsive support
why.note: Note: public pricing is by request for licensed professionals.
home.cards.irongene.p: 45 mg ferrous bisglycinate — gentle, bioavailable iron.
home.cards.serum.p: Potent Vitamin C serum for brightening and antioxidant protection.
home.cards.proctonor.p: Supportive care formula. Easy to recommend, trusted by physicians.
